weekly_focus: This week focuses on building muscle and burning fat to achieve a shredded physique by combining strength training with HIIT cardio and prioritizing recovery.

schedule.activity: 45 MIN IRON SERIES FULL BODY WORKOUT
schedule.notes: Full body strength training to kickstart the week.

workout_details.description: A longer, slower-paced strength session from the Iron Series. Focuses on muscle building and controlled movements.
workout_details.title: 45 MIN IRON SERIES FULL BODY WORKOUT | Caroline Girvan

schedule.notes: Target legs and glutes for hypertrophy.

workout_details.description: Focused leg day using dumbbells. Targets quads, hamstrings and glutes for building definition and strength.
workout_details.title: 30 MIN DUMBBELL LEG WORKOUT | Caroline Girvan

schedule.notes: HIIT to burn fat and improve cardiovascular fitness.

workout_details.description: High Intensity Interval Training to burn calories and improve cardiovascular health. No equipment needed.
workout_details.title: 15 MIN HIIT CARDIO WORKOUT | No Equipment | Caroline Girvan

schedule.activity: 15 MIN UPPER BODY WORKOUT - Shoulders & Arms
schedule.notes: Focus on upper body strength and muscle definition.

workout_details.description: Quick but intense upper body blast focusing on sculpting shoulders and arms.
workout_details.title: 15 MIN UPPER BODY WORKOUT - Shoulders & Arms | Caroline Girvan

schedule.activity: 45 MIN IRON SERIES FULL BODY WORKOUT
schedule.notes: Second full body workout of the week, focusing on overall strength.

workout_details.description: A longer, slower-paced strength session from the Iron Series. Focuses on muscle building and controlled movements.
workout_details.title: 45 MIN IRON SERIES FULL BODY WORKOUT | Caroline Girvan

schedule.activity: 20 MIN FULL BODY STRETCH & COOL DOWN
schedule.notes: Active recovery day to improve flexibility and reduce muscle soreness.
Complete rest to allow for full recovery.
